Dear Travelers, do you really know our good friend [[Venti]]?

Paimon wishes to quiz everyone~

Take part in the quiz, provide the correct answer and you can win Primogems!

==How to Participate==
#Head to [[Genshin Impact]]'s official Facebook Page (https://www.facebook.com/Genshinimpact)
#Click 'Send Message' in the top right corner of the page to contact Paimon via Messenger
#After choosing your language, click 'Paimon's Quiz' to participate.

==Reward for answering correctly==
{{Card|Primogem|40|5}}

==Event Deadline==
March 16, 23:59 (UTC+8)

==Important Reminder==
#Travelers who answered correctly should follow instructions and provide their correct UID, otherwise Paimon won't be able to send the reward! (Please note that each UID can only participate in the event once.)
#Should Travelers be unable to claim the rewards due to them providing the incorrect UID, The Genshin Impact Operations Team is not held responsible.
#The Genshin Impact Official Operations Team reserves the right of final interpretation for this event.
